roleDescription: Spearheaded the end-to-end development of the Izinto Cross-Platform Ecommerce App, leveraging Flutter to create a seamless user experience across iOS and Android devices. title: BrandClique Dashboard App
description: Brandclique is a South African brand-creator marketplace featuring an automated campaign management system, real-time analytics dashboards, and creator portfolio interfaces. It is built as a scalable platform capable of handling thousands of concurrent brand-creator interactions.
roleDescription: Led frontend development for a brand-creator marketplace platform using React/Next.js with Tailwind CSS, implementing automated campaign management systems and real-time engagement tools. Built hybrid B2B/B2C interfaces with Firebase backend for user data and campaign storage, focusing on responsive design, scalability, and seamless creator-brand interactions.

title: README Prettier Web Tool
description: A simple, intuitive markdown editor that allows developers to quickly create, customize, and generate professional README files for their projects with minimal effort.
roleDescription: Built a responsive markdown editor using React/Next.js with Tailwind CSS, implementing real-time preview, customizable templates, and one-click export functionality. Deployed on Vercel with optimized performance for seamless user experience.
